mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM customer_service AS cs WHERE cs.status IS NULL

SELECT
FROM customer_service AS cs WHERE cs.status !='已处理' OR cs.status IS null

FROM customer_service AS cs WHERE cs.status ='已归档'
